column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Despite the coffee being "eh"
column2: the pastries and breakfast sandwich are BY FAR best breakfast meal I have ever had. In fact
column3: breakfast for two cost us around $40 (definitely $$) but so absolutely worth it. Nothing in the sandwich is food service. They bake the bun
column5: they ground and grill the sausage on site
column6: too. The herb and spices they mash into the meat are on point. Just thinking about it...makes me want to go back immediately!
